description: Version 11 of the Maritime Boundaries from the VLIZ Maritime Boundaries Geodatabase. Boundaries have been built using information about treaties between coastal countries. When treaties are not available, median lines have been calculated. This dataset also contains delimitation of disputed boundaries and joint regimes.
keywords: territorial seas, contiguous zone, marine regions, World Oceans, marine, exclusive economic zones, law of the sea, territorial waters, world oceans, archipelagic waters, internal waters, boundaries, Administrative units
name: Maritime Boundaries (v11, world, 2019)
